content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetImagesForFamily path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/workload/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/images/{image_family} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name imagefamily
desc an image family
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
name deprecated
desc if present and true include deprecated images in the result
in query
required false
schema
type bool
format bool
sum get a familys images
desc only nondeprecated images are returned by default this will not error but instead return an empty list if the family is not found
responses
200
v1getimagesforfamilyresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
v1image
type obj
props
stackid
type str
readonly true
desc the id of the stack that an image belongs to
id
type str
readonly true
desc an images unique identifier
family
type str
desc an images family

families are logical groupings of images
tag
type str
desc the images tag

image tags are akin to versions
v1imagemetadata
type obj
props
v1stringmapentry
type str
desc a string to string key/value pair
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date that a workload image was created

the date an image was created
readonly true
nullable true
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date that a workload image was last updated

the date an image was last updated
readonly true
nullable true
desc an images metadata
desc
type str
desc an images description

this is optional and may not be more than 1000 characters
v1imagestatus
type str
default imagestatusunknown
desc which capture status an image is currently in

 imagestatusunknown the image status is unknown
  pending the image is pending creation
  processing the image is processing
  ready the image is ready
  failed the image failed to be created
imagesize
type str
desc an images archive size in bytes

this is only available on ready images
readonly true
volumesize
type str
desc an images volume size in bytes

this is only available on ready images
readonly true
v1imagedeprecation
type obj
props
deprecationdate
type str
format datetime
desc the date when an image is considered deprecated

deprecated images may be used in new virtual machine based workloads but are no longer considered for the default tag nor are they returned in image lists by default
obsoletiondate
type str
format datetime
desc the date when an image is considered obsolete

obsolete images may not be used in new virtual machine based workloads if an obsoletion date is present then the deprecation date must also be present with a same or earlier date
deletiondate
type str
format datetime
desc the date when an image is deleted

deletion dates cannot be before an images deprecation or obsoletion dates
desc an images deprecation settings
conditions
type arr
v1imagecondition
type obj
props
type
type str
desc type of the condition
v1imageconditionstatus
type str
default imageconditionstatusunknown
desc which status an image is currently in

 imageconditionstatusunknown the condition status is unknown
  true the condition is true
  false the condition is false
checkedat
type str
format datetime
desc the last time the condition was checked
transitionedat
type str
format datetime
desc the last time the condition transitioned status
reason
type str
desc a stable identifier for the reason the condition is in its current state
message
type str
desc a human readable message with details regarding the condition
desc further information about an images status
readonly true
desc details about an images status
desc a virtual machine image
desc the requested images
desc a response from a request to retrieve images by a family
title: 33_Virtual Machine Images_GetImagesForFamily_187.json
